vulnerabilities.details: Remote code execution vulnerability in Apache Log4j2.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update Log4j to version 2.17.1 or later.
Upgrade to Struts 2.3.32 or 2.5.10.1 or later.

vulnerabilities.details: Apache Tomcat Remote Code Execution on Windows.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Upgrade Tomcat and ensure the CGI Servlet is disabled.
